text: فَلَمَّا تَرَـٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

translation.en: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken
translation.id: Maka ketika kedua golongan itu saling melihat, berkatalah pengikut-pengikut Musa, "Kita benar-benar akan tersusul
